revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt. Chimney |image = [[File:Mt. Chimney.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Mt. Chimney. |tokens = 20,000 |location = North of Route 112, east of Lavaridge Town. }} '''Mt. Chimney''' is a dungeon in [[Hoenn]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in an 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 260,000 |- | Numel (Boss) || 770,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Zubat * Poochyena * Numel (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Egg}} [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |}
